name: BiKase Universal Phone Holder - Unisex
categories: Mounts and sensors for bike computers
description: Keep your phone, and your hands, securely on your handlebars while keeping an eye on your route. Rubber-lined shockcord holds the corners of your phone secure to prevent slippage.TPE frame holds most phones with or without a case.Anti-slip shockcord holds phone securely.Handlebar mount fits handlebars from 24 ̶ 31.8mm diameter.
